remarks: The full vector space ` U ` constructed from a Hilbert lattice ` K ` (given a fiducial hyperplane ` W ` ) is a group.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jun-2014.)
statement:
dvhgrp.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dvhgrp.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvhgrp.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhgrp.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhgrp.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhgrp.d $e |- D = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
dvhgrp.p $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` D ) $.
dvhgrp.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) $.
dvhgrp.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` D ) $.
dvhgrp.i $e |- I = ( invg ` D ) $.
dvhgrp $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> U e. Grp ) $.
